thread.title: Another dangerous product we need to register
thread.title_full: Another dangerous product we need to register - The Washington Post

author: John Woodrow Cox
title: Another dangerous product we need to register
text:
DJI's Inspire drone is seen at the 35th GITEX Technology Week at Dubai World Trade Center on Sunday in Dubai, United Arab Emirates. (Jonathan Gibbons/Getty Images) October 21 at 5:21 PM Let’s see. According to the Oct. 20 front-page article “ In shift, FAA will require drones to be registered ,” we will have to register our drones, as we recognize they are “posing a threat to aviation safety.” We already register cars, since there is danger on the roads. What other threats to safety should we recognize from products — large and small — that are openly available on the market? Products that often are legally hidden from view? Products that are immune from liability claims related to safety? Hmmm.
I know I’ll think of it.
Tom Martella , Washington
